actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain National Forest lands in the State of Nevada, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain lands to Douglas County, Nevada, (upon which the County shall build a warehouse) in exchange for certain lands from such County to be added to the Toiyabe National Forest.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain National Forest lands in the State of Nevada, and for other purposes.
